00299 /***************************************************************************/
00308 __STATIC_INLINE void LCD_Enable(bool enable)
00309 {
00310   if (enable)
00311   {
00312     LCD->CTRL |= LCD_CTRL_EN;
00313   }
00314   else
00315   {
00316     LCD->CTRL &= ~LCD_CTRL_EN;
00317   }
00318 }
00319 
00320 
00321 /***************************************************************************/
00328 __STATIC_INLINE void LCD_AnimEnable(bool enable)
00329 {
00330   if (enable)
00331   {
00332     LCD->BACTRL |= LCD_BACTRL_AEN;
00333   }
00334   else
00335   {
00336     LCD->BACTRL &= ~LCD_BACTRL_AEN;
00337   }
00338 }
00339 
00340

00349 {
00350   if (enable)
00351   {
00352     LCD->BACTRL |= LCD_BACTRL_BLINKEN;
00353   }
00354   else
00355   {
00356     LCD->BACTRL &= ~LCD_BACTRL_BLINKEN;
00357   }
00358 }

00401 /***************************************************************************/
00408 __STATIC_INLINE int LCD_AnimState(void)
00409 {
00410   return (int)(LCD->STATUS & _LCD_STATUS_ASTATE_MASK) >> _LCD_STATUS_ASTATE_SHIFT;
00411 }
00412 
00413 
00414 /***************************************************************************/
00421 __STATIC_INLINE int LCD_BlinkState(void)
00422 {
00423   return (int)(LCD->STATUS & _LCD_STATUS_BLINK_MASK) >> _LCD_STATUS_BLINK_SHIFT;
00424 }

00427 /***************************************************************************/
00435 __STATIC_INLINE void LCD_FreezeEnable(bool enable)
00436 {
00437   if (enable)
00438   {
00439     LCD->FREEZE = LCD_FREEZE_REGFREEZE_FREEZE;
00440   }
00441   else
00442   {
00443     LCD->FREEZE = LCD_FREEZE_REGFREEZE_UPDATE;
00444   }
00445 }

00448 /***************************************************************************/
00455 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t LCD_SyncBusyGet(void)
00456 {
00457   return LCD->SYNCBUSY;
00458 }
00459 
00460 
00461 /***************************************************************************/
00468 __STATIC_INLINE void LCD_SyncBusyDelay(uint32_t flags)
00469 {
00470   while (LCD->SYNCBUSY & flags)
00471     ;
00472 }

00475 /***************************************************************************/
00483 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t LCD_IntGet(void)
00484 {
00485   return LCD->IF;
00486 }
00487 
00488 
00489 /***************************************************************************/
00507 __STATIC_INLINE uint32_t LCD_IntGetEnabled(void)
00508 {
00509   uint32_t tmp = 0U;
00510 
00511   /* Store LCD->IEN in temporary variable in order to define explicit order
00512    * of volatile accesses. */
00513   tmp = LCD->IEN;
00514 
00515   /* Bitwise AND of pending and enabled interrupts */
00516   return LCD->IF & tmp;
00517 }
00518 
00519 
00520 /***************************************************************************/
00529 __STATIC_INLINE void LCD_IntSet(uint32_t flags)
00530 {
00531   LCD->IFS = flags;
00532 }
00533 
00534 
00535 /***************************************************************************/
00544 __STATIC_INLINE void LCD_IntEnable(uint32_t flags)
00545 {
00546   LCD->IEN |= flags;
00547 }
00548 
00549 
00550 /***************************************************************************/
00559 __STATIC_INLINE void LCD_IntDisable(uint32_t flags)
00560 {
00561   LCD->IEN &= ~flags;
00562 }
00563 
00564 
00565 /***************************************************************************/
00574 __STATIC_INLINE void LCD_IntClear(uint32_t flags)
00575 {
00576   LCD->IFC = flags;
00577 }
